name: Chris Keech
text: The cheese steak and chicken parm subs were not bad and had some flavor. Worth ordering again. Better to pick up because the delivery charge was almost 5 dollars not counting the tip

name: Kimberly
text: Great pizza.  Always delicious.  Cheese bread it's delicious too!

name: Sam Bloink
text: Always have amazing service and quality here. ( I've never had delivery from this location)

name: Kelly Karbowski
text: Very satisfied with this visit for takeout pizza.

name: K R
text: Consistency is key when it comes to pizza and this place has always been consistent. The stuffed crust is the best thing to come to hungry howies. Please don't ever get rid of it! Love the crust options with asiago.

name: Mindy Rosin
text: This is my favorite pizza place! Jodi has been taking my "special" order for over 10 years.. She knows me by name and never gets it wrong. The pizza is yummy and Jodi is an excellent employee. Thanks.

name: ksmitty1234
text: Called to place an order on 40 boneless wings I was greeted very poorly And before I was done explaining my order I was hung up on and my card information was already given,then I was asked what amount of tip I was going to put on the card ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Weber
text: Great Pizza. Highly recommended! Really good prices too. Also have a good rewards program. Fast delivery and also fast if picking up.

text: All there food was good no complane there

name: Ghost
text: A solid pizza place.  Certainly has a unique flavor, and on top of that the flavored crust can change any pizza to suit you!  Based on consumer reviews I would recommend pick-up, but they do deliver.  I pick up my order everytime and have never had any issues.

name: Tony Moten
text: I made a online purchase at 9:05pm may 3rd got there around 9:22. Went to the cashier told them pick up for*** they say o it a be just a few more mins I end up seeing them start my food at that time try tell them give me my money back they ‚Ä¶More

name: j f
text: Great staff and always greet me with a hello, smiles and make sure my order is fresh and correct before I go.

name: David Hinz
text: I've always wanted to try the stuffed crust pizza they offer. I was disappointed because the entire crust was not done. It was almost doughy. I had one piece and the rest sat in the fridge for a week before I threw it out. Will not go there again.

text: Decent pizza for the price, for a chain (though nothing to write home about). Staff at this location was very friendly and helpful.

text: It's the best place if your looking for quick delivery and the best tasting pizza ever. The bread sticks are amazing and they have the best offers. I don't see why people are going to Jets.

name: Ronald Beson
text: I feel like to get extra cheese you really need to ask for triple cheese at this location. This hungry Howie's does not compare in anyway to the mt. Pleasant hungry Howes.

name: Christopher
text: Bought a medium 1 topping pizza w/ garlic butter crust and it was fast and delicious. No more than 10 minutes and it was done. It is a lot smaller than little ceasars hot-n-ready and costs about $2.50 more but the taste is worth the extra cost.

name: KaytlenAndCounting g
text: Very upset with my service tonight. Ordered wings with hair in them!!!? I am not the type to complain but when i called they never solved my issue. They said they can credit me wings for next time...but i was hungry tonight!!!! I am very upset. Smh. Never solved their mistake....
